marker.address: 4480 S Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV 89119
marker.title: Kaizen Sushi
marker.nfo: Small local sushi restaurant catering mostly to those who frequent Las Vegas nightlife hotspots.

marker.address: 1511 Main Street Las Vegas, NV 89104
marker.title: First Friday
marker.nfo: Come enjoy the monthly block party, full of culture and awareness in the downtown Las Vegas Arts District.

marker.address: 3945 S Durango Dr Las Vegas NV 89117
marker.title: Naked Fish's Sushi and Grill
marker.nfo: Naked Fish promises that your dining experiment will be full of excitement of the highest quality of food and hospitality.

marker.address: 4505 S. Maryland Parkway Las Vegas, NV 89154
marker.title: UNLV Performing Arts
marker.nfo: Do you want to see, hear, and feel art? Experience it at UNLV.

marker.address: 2 Kyle Canyon Rd. Mt. Charleston, NV 89124
marker.title: Mt. Charleston
marker.nfo: Explore Mt. Charleston as a relaxing and afforable getaway with fun activities, scenic drives and places to camp.

marker.address: 3570 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV 89109
marker.title: Brahma Shrine
marker.nfo: Achieve enlightenment at the shrine of an Eastern diety, the only one of it's kind in the Western world.

marker.address: 4480 S Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV 89119
marker.title: Kaizen Sushi
marker.nfo: Small local sushi restaurant catering mostly to those who frequent Las Vegas nightlife hotspots.

marker.address: 221 North Rampart Blvd Las Vegas NV 89144
marker.title: Speidini's Restaurant
marker.nfo: Speidini's restaurant is a not too expensive, elegant place to dine. With great food and atmosphere, it is an excellent choice to bring a date, significant other, or family.

marker.address: 6394 W. Sahara Ave. Las Vegas, Nevada. 89146
marker.title: Danielle's Ice Cream and Chocolates
marker.nfo: Want a taste of Heaven, come by Danielle's and try their famous white chocolate covered popcorn and other homemade delights.

marker.address: 750 S. Rampart Blvd. Las Vegas, NV 89145
marker.title: Happy Hour at Kona Grill
marker.nfo: Las Vegas' Best Happy Hour Spot for a Great Time, Great Atmosphere, Great Drinks and Great Eats for your Buck!!

marker.address: 7915 W. Sahara Las Vegas, NV 89117
marker.title: Yoga Sanctuary
marker.nfo: This studio is the best place for yoga in all of Las Vegas. They offer a wide variety of classes 7 days a week. They offer many different styles of yoga and have amazing teachers that will lead you on your journey to relaxation and serenity. They have two studios in town and are in both the mornings and evenings.

marker.address: 1000 Scenic Dr Las Vegas, NV 89144
marker.title: Red Rock Canyon
marker.nfo: nfoWant to take your family somewhere besides the crowded smoky casinos? Red Rock Canyon Park is a beautiful place to take your family to get some fresh air, see magnificent sights of nature and spend some time together.

marker.address: 3248 Civic Center Drive North Las Vegas NV 89030
marker.title: Capoeira Mandinga
marker.nfo: It can be said that Capoeira defies description, that one must witness its magic firsthand to comprehend its energy, beauty, and skill. To understand the movement, music, and magnetism of Capoeira, we must explore the art's fascinating tradition and mysterious history.

marker.address: 950 W Mesquite Blvd Mesquite, NV 89027
marker.title: The CasaBlanca Resort
marker.nfo: This peaceful resort features a spacious casino floor, a championship golf course, world-class spa facilities, fine dining and nightly entertainment.

marker.address: 100 South Rampart Blvd Las Vegas Nevada 89145
marker.title: Angel Park Golf Course
marker.nfo: Angel Park is a fun golf club with a driving range, 18-hole putting course, and a short 12-hole course known as Cloud 9. Angel Park is located directly across from the Rampart Hotel/Casino in the Summerlin region of Las Vegas, Nevada.

marker.address: 3900 Paradise Rd. Las Vegas, NV 89109
marker.title: Firefly
marker.nfo: Firefly is a Tapas Kitchen and Bar that specializes in Spanish infursed cuisine, drinks, and a fun social atmosphere.

marker.address: 3330 E. Tropicana Ave. Las Vegas, NV 89121
marker.title: Pinball Hall of Fame
marker.nfo: Pinball Interactive Musuem open to public family friendly, and all the profits go to Salvation Army.

marker.address: 1000 Scenic Dr Las Vegas, NV 89144
marker.title: Visit Red Rock
marker.nfo: Informational site about the the Red Rock loop with location and directions.

marker.address: 40 Costa di Lago Henderson, NV 89011
marker.title: Monte Lago Village
marker.nfo: Gelato and Sorbet ice cream shop.

marker.address: 3200 Las Vegas Blvd. S. Las Vegas, NV 89109
marker.title: HotCats
marker.nfo: No discription

marker.address: 3333 Blue Diamond Road Las Vegas NV 89139
marker.title: Silverton Casino Aquarium
marker.nfo: The Silverton Casino has a 117,000 gallon aquarium that features 4,000 different types of fish, and sharks. There are Marine Biologists that swim with the fish/sharks to feed them, as well as occasionally put on an underwater dance routine.

marker.address: 7991 W. Tropical Pky Las Vegas Nevada 89149
marker.title: Centennial Hills Salon and DaySpa
marker.nfo: Relaxing and Invigorating spa in the North western part of the valley.

marker.address: 2470 E. Pebble Road Henderson, NV 89074
marker.title: Tight Rack
marker.nfo: Enjoy a game of beer pong and pool with your friends. Under 21 welcome before 10pm only!

marker.address: 1200 Old Park Road Las Vegas, NV 89124
marker.title: Mt. Charleston Lodge
marker.nfo: The Mt. Charleston Lodge offers a relaxing getaway from the lights and noise of Las Vegas. Just a short drive from the strip takes you to the mountain retreat for dining, hiking, and lodging.

marker.address: 707 EAST FREMONT STREET LAS VEGAS ,NV 89101
marker.title: PURBAN POETRY PULPIT @ TAKE1
marker.nfo: BI-WEEKENDLY SPACE FOR POETS TO PERFORM IN THE CITY.

marker.address: 2601 E Sunset Road Las Vegas NV 89120

marker.nfo: Frisbee Golf is a fun way to maintain an active lifestyle, this website will provide the basics for getting started.

marker.address: 900 W. Bonanza Road Las Vegas 89106
marker.title: The Historical Moulin Rouge
marker.nfo: A retrospective look at the first racially integrated hotel and casino in Las Vegas, Nevada.

marker.address: 8101 Racel Street, Las Vegas 89131
marker.title: Gilcrease Nature Sanctuary
marker.nfo: A non-profit wildlife refuge that allows visitors to closely observe animals they might not ordinarily get a chance to see.

marker.address: 4775 Mc Leod Dr. Las Vegas NV 89121
marker.title: Paradise Park
marker.nfo: Paradise Park is a beautiful park with many features. Visitors can enjoy the softball field, swingsets, basketball courts, swimming pool, water slide, and picnic areas.

marker.address: 10820 W Charleston Blvd Las Vegas NV 89135
marker.title: Agave
marker.nfo: A contemporary Mexican restaurant and tequila bar.

marker.address: 1775 E. Tropicana Ave. Las Vegas Nevada 89119
marker.title: Liberace Museum
marker.nfo: An appreciation of Liberace's art and a display of belongings for rememberence.

marker.address: 231 SOUTH 3RD STREET LAS VEGAS 89101
marker.title: Friday Night Jazz @ the Downtown Coffee Co.
marker.nfo: The Downtown Coffee Co. transforms every Friday night into a cool place to find hot jazz.

marker.address: 7920 West Tropical Pkwy Las Vegas 89149
marker.title: Market Grille Cafe
marker.nfo: Mediterranean food that is fast and fresh. One of the only fast food mediterranean style restaurant in Las Vegas, with quality food and family friendly atmosphere.

marker.address: 4225 S. Eastern Ave Las Vegas NV 89119
marker.title: Zia Record Exchange
marker.nfo: One of the last record stores in Vegas.

marker.address: 1200 Kitty Hawk Dr, Mesquite, NV
marker.title: Skydive Mesquite
marker.nfo: Best place in Nevada to Skydive!!!

marker.title: Sunset Park
marker.nfo: Sunset park is a great place for sports enthusiasts, families and even dogs to enjoy the outdoors.

marker.title: Red Rock Canyon
marker.nfo: Tips and Guidelines for Hiking Various Trails at Red Rock Canyon.

marker.title: Boulder City Fishing Pond
marker.nfo: The Boulder City Fishing Pond provides recreational fishing for residents and visitors.

marker.nfo: Fun in the sun with dinosaurs, a playground, fields and a lake!
